code:
flowchart TD
    A[Visit /matrix-v1]
    A --> B[Enter Name]
    B --> C{Choose Pill}
    C -->|Blue Pill| H[Home (/)]
    C -->|Red Pill| T[Terminal (/matrix-v1/terminal)]

    T -->|Wrong passcode| D[Access Denied]
    D --> T
    T -->|Correct passcode| X[Transition (/matrix-v1/transition)]

    X -->|After 3s| M[Message (/matrix-v1/message)]
    M -->|Continue| Z[Puzzle (/matrix-v1/puzzle)]
    Z -->|Answer| TR[Trace (/matrix-v1/trace)]
    TR -->|After countdown| P[Portal (/matrix-v1/portal)]

    P --> S[/snack-trail]
    P --> P1[/pixel-art]
    P --> P2[/robot-lab]
    P --> P3[/lego-build]
    P --> P4[/lego-inventory]
    P --> P5[/little-alchemy]
